summary: In the "flower houses" (upscale brothels) of Shanghai, various interweaving stories of love, loyalty, and deceit play out subtly.
cast: Tony Chiu-Wai Leung|Michiko Hada|Michelle Reis|Carina Lau|Jack Kao|Rebecca Pan|Vicky Wei|Hsuan Fang|Annie Shizuka Inoh|Ming Hsu|Josephine A. Blankstein|Pauline Chan|Simon Chang|Tony Chang|Shui Chit Cheung|Wei-kuo Chiang|Hui-ni Hsu|Yiu-Ming Lee|Yu-Hang Lee|Yu-han Lin|Firebird Liu|Tsai-erh Luo|Moon Wang|Yan Xie
title: Hai shang hua
